Global.FormSubmissionError: There was an unknown error submitting your form.
Global.FormValidationError: Please correct the errors on the form.
Global.GeolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by this browser.
Global.GeoPositionUnavailable: Location is not available at this time.
Global.GeoLocationDenied: You have not given permission to access your current location.

Page-Description.Page-Description: If you are a service provider and have an existing account sign into your account below.

Login-Form.More-Options: If you need your verification email sent again, or to register to be a service provider click the corresponding button below.

Form-Submit-Options.Register: Register to be a Service Provider here

Page-Head.Title: Search For Services
Page-Head.Description: Use the filtered search below to find the service that meets your needs.

Search-List.Service-Request: Tell us about a missing service

Page-Head.Title: Give Feedback on Services
Page-Head.Description: Please search for a service provider first to give your feedback, you must select the service provider and click on give feedback to begin.

Page-Head.Title: Give Feedback on Services
Page-Head.Description: Please search for a service provider first to give your feedback, you must select the service provider and click on give feedback to begin.

Page-Description.Page-Description: Use the filtered search below to find the service that meets your needs.

Service-Map.No-Search-Results: No services matched your search terms. Please try other terms.
Service-Map.Results-Truncated: There were more results than could be displayed. Try a more specific search.
Service-Map.More-Results: Currently showing {thecount} out of {total_results} services, please zoom in to the designated area to see more services.

Page-Description.Page-Description: Fill out the form below and apply to have a new approved service.

Service-Form.Is-Mobile-Help: A mobile service is delivered to the beneficiary. A beneficiary must come get a non-mobile service.
Service-Form.Service-Area-Help: The location of the service you provide. For a mobile service, please choose the service area in which the service can be delivered.
Service-Form.Service-Description-Help: A short explanation about the mentioned service; this explains more about the provided service and helps identify it and its components.
Service-Form.Service-Hours-Help: Please mention the detailed hours of work; this assists the beneficiary in accessing the service easily and without obstacles.
Service-Form.Service-Cost-Help: Please mention whether the offered service is free of charge or not. If not, please mention the cost of it.
Service-Form.Selection-Criteria-Help: Determines the criteria under which the beneficiary is allowed to benefit from the service. Ex: females aged between 3 and 30 years old.

Service-Request-Form.Legend: To suggest a service, please fill out the form below
Service-Request-Form.Service-Address-Help: Where this service is being delivered.
Service-Request-Form.Service-Contact-Help: Please enter personal contact detail, as it will be used to contact you for more details.
Service-Request-Form.Service-Description-Help: Enter some details about this service.
Service-Request-Form.Rating: Rate the Service (from 1 to 5, where 5 is the highest rating possible):

Basic.Legend: Basic details to register a service provider:
Basic.Name: Name of Service Provider
Basic.Focal-Point-Name-Help: The name of the person to refer to in case of feedback or clarification
Basic.Provider-Type-Help: Mention what type of provider are you; ex: local NGO, international NGO
Basic.MonthlyBeneficiaries-Help: Number of persons who benefit from your service per month
Basic.Description-Help: A short explanation about the mentioned service; this explains more about the provided service and helps identify it and its components.
Basic.Address-Help: The address of the main headquarters of your NGO or firm

Service-Information.Service-Cost: Cost of Service (Optional Field, in USD)

Failed.Title: Your account activation Failed.
Failed.Description: There was a problem setting up your service provider account. Please click the resend confirmation email button below to have another confirmation email sent to your email account.

Resent.Title: Your activation e-mail has been resent.
Resent.Description: We have sent a confirmation email to the email account you used during registration. Click the confirmation link in the email to complete the registration process.   If you do not receive the email in a few minutes, check your spam folder.

Page-Description.Page-Description: Below is a list of services you have applied to provide. Approved services are marked in green. Un-approved services are marked in red. Services pending approval are unmarked.

Service-List.Empty-Message: You have not submitted any services yet. You may submit your first service for review by tapping the New Service button.
Service-List.Import-File: Please choose an Excel spreadsheet file to import.

Page-Description.Page-Description: We have sent a confirmation email to the email account you used during registration. Click the confirmation link in the email to complete the registration process.  If you do not receive the email in a few minutes, check your spam folder.
To reset your password enter your email address in the field below then click submit. Clicking submit will send a link to your email account that will direct you to the password reset page.

Password-Reset.Submitted: We have sent an email to the email address. Check your email for a message containing a link to the password reset form. If you do not receive the email in a few minutes, check your spam folder.

Password-Reset-Form.Title: Password Reset Form
Password-Reset-Form.Description: Enter your new password in the text field below, then click submit to update your password.
Password-Reset-Form.Invalid-Link: This is not a valid password reset link. Please check that it was copied correctly from the email, and has not already been used. Go to the login page if you need to request another reset link.

About.Title: About ServiceInfo
About.Sentence1: Powered by the International Rescue Committee.
About.Remainder: ServiceInfo is a tool that allows both service providers to register their services online and beneficiaries to both discover those services on a map and give feedback on them. ServiceInfo is open source and free to use.

Contact.Title: Reach Us
Contact.Paragraph: Contact us on one of our social networks below or drop us a mail at

Feedback-Form.Title: Feedback form
Feedback-Form.What-Service: You are giving feedback on this service:
Feedback-Form.Name: Name
Feedback-Form.non-delivery-explained: Did you receive a clear explanation for why the service you sought was not delivered to you?

WaitTime.label: How long did you wait for the service to be delivered, after contacting the service provider?

wait-time-satisfaction.label: How do you rate your satisfaction with the time that you waited for the service to be delivered (from 1 to 5, where 5 is the highest rating possible)?

Quality.label: How would you rate the quality of the service you received (from 1 to 5, where 5 is the highest rating possible)?

difficulty-contacting.label: Did you experience difficulties contacting the provider of the service you needed?
difficulty-contacting.didntknow: Did not know how to contact them
difficulty-contacting.nophoneresponse: Tried to contact them by phone but received no response
difficulty-contacting.noresponse: Tried to contact them in person but received no response or did not find their office
difficulty-contacting.unhelpful: Contacted them but response was unhelpful

staff-satisfaction.label: How would you rate your satisfaction with the staff of the organization that provided services to you, (from 1 to 5, where 5 is the highest rating possible)?

Feedback-Form.other-difficulties: Other difficulties contacting the service provider

anonymous.label: I want my feedback to be anonymous to the service provider

Feedback-Tool.Title: Feedback on services
Feedback-Tool.Body: To give feedback, please search for a service, go to its page, and use the Feedback button.

User.Title: I'm a service user, I want to

Provider.Title: I'm a service provider, I want to

Logged-Out.Register: Register to be a Service Provider
Logged-Out.Login: Login to an Existing Service Provider Account

Export-Tool.Title: Export services
Export-Tool.Description1: Click the button to download an Excel spreadsheet file containing the data you have access to.
Export-Tool.Description2: The file will contain three tabs or sheets: one for provider data, one for service data, and one for selection criteria.
Export-Tool.Description3: You can edit the information in the spreadsheet and import it to make changes to the data.

Import-Tool.Title: Import services
Import-Tool.Errors: There were errors in the file.  No data was changed.

Help.Title: Help
Help.Help1: On import, any invalid data will cause the entire import to be rejected and the errors will be reported to the user.
Help.Help2: Any row with a valid ID field but with all the other values cleared means to delete that record.
Help.Help3: Times of day are represented as a string in 24-hour 'HH:MM' format.
Help.Help4: The provider sheet has a column “password” that never contains any values on export. The provider password can be changed by putting a value in that column for import.
Help.Help5: When creating a new service, leave the 'ID' column blank.
Help.Help6: When adding selection criteria to an existing service, set the 'service__id' field to the 'ID' of the existing service.
Help.Help7: When adding selection criteria to a new service, set the 'service__id' field to the 'name_en' of the new service.

Options.QOS: Quality of Service Delivered by Service Type
Options.Failure: Explanation of Service Delivery Failure by Service Type
Options.Contact: Difficulties Contacting Service Providers by Service Type
Options.Communication: Satisfaction with Staff Communication by Service Type
Options.NumServicesByServiceType: Number of services by Location and Service Type
Options.NumServicesByProviderType: Number of services by Location and Provider Type
